title: "External wall" means an outer wall of a building not being a partition wall even though adjoining a wall of another building and also means a wall abutting on an interior open space of any building
clause_text: "External wall" means an outer wall of a building not being a partition wall even though adjoining a wall of another building and also means a wall abutting on an interior open space of any building.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "External wall" means an outer wall of a building not being a partition wall even though adjoining a wall of another building and also means a wall abutting on an interior open space of any building.
